200.name: Advanced Intel
200.description: Allows long range targeting of Bloons in radius of your other towers.

300.name: Submerge and Support
300.description: Adds Submerge targeting option that permanently reveals Camo bloons in its radius but does not attack while submerged.

400.name: Bloontonium Reactor
400.description: Submerge to detect Camo, pop Bloons and reduce ability cooldowns of nearby water-based Monkeys by 15%.

500.name: Energizer
500.description: Reduces ability cooldowns everywhere by 20%. While in radius, heroes earn XP 50% faster and water Monkey ability cooldowns are halved.

010.name: Barbed Darts
010.description: Sub's darts can pop an additional 3 bloons each.

020.name: Heat-tipped Darts
020.description: Heat tipped darts allow popping of Frozen and Lead Bloons.

030.name: Ballistic Missile
030.description: Missile seeks target within range and does extra MOAB and Ceramic damage.

040.name: First Strike Capability
040.description: First Strike Ability: A devastating missile strike targeting the largest bloon on screen, plus splash damage.

050.name: Pre-emptive Strike
050.description: Automatically triggers a powerful missile attack whenever MOAB-Class Bloon spawns from the Bloon entrance.

001.name: Twin Guns
001.description: Added twin gun doubles attack speed. Enhances Ballistic Missile and Bloontonium Reactor.

002.name: Airburst Darts
002.description: Airburst darts split into 3 on impact for massively increased popping power. Further enhances Bloontonium Reactor.

003.name: Triple Guns
003.description: Adds a third gun for even faster firing.

004.name: Armor Piercing Darts
004.description: Special AP darts gain increased damage and popping power, plus additional damage to MOAB class Bloons.

005.name: Sub Commander
005.description: Adds extra pierce and damage to Commander and all Subs in its radius.
